contactId.title: contactId
contactId.description: The contactId for the current messaging user, this should be the EndUserContactId set on the MessagingSession.

contactRecord.title: contactRecord
contactRecord.description: This is the contactRecord for the current contact Messaging User. Use this for context with other actions.

errorMessage.title: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The error message if the action fails. Follow the messages instructions and display a sanitised error message to the user (don't show PII).
